CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordType.Name, "Software", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), " PDM "), "PDM", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), " CAM "), "CAM", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), " CAD "), "CAD", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), "Electrical"), "Elec", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), "Simulation"), "SIM", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), "Motion"), "SIM", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), "Plastics"), "SIM", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), "Premium"), "CAD", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), "Standard"), "CAD", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Item__c), "Professional") && (TEXT(Item__c) <> "MySolidWorks Professional"), "CAD", "") ))))))))) , "Hardware", IF(TEXT(Printer_Technology__c) <> "", TEXT(Printer_Technology__c), IF(TEXT(Asset_Type__c)='Scanner', TEXT(Asset_Type__c), "")) , "")
CustomField.label: Asset Group
